column1: rice_fields_modifier_desc0:"Peasants in this province are growing nutritious rice
column2: filling their bellies and inspiring new cuisine."

column1: fp2_flavor.0001.desc0:"[rice_propagator.GetTitledFirstNamePossessive] capital is truly prosperous. The peasants of [rice_propagator_capital.GetNameNoTier] are fat and happy – and #EMP productive!#!\n\nThe Muslims have brought a new crop to their lands
column2: rice. It is easy to grow and feeds the people well. Is this part of their success
column3: I wonder? I would not mind more productive peasantry myself...\n\nPerhaps I should establish rice fields in my own capital? But how should I get started?"

column1: fp2_flavor.0001.b0:"Surely [rice_propagator.GetSheHe] would gladly share with a friend?"
fp2_flavor.0001.c0:"The secret will be mine... send an agent."

column2: I will not deal with Muslims."
